title: The Crap Husband's Guide To A Successful Marriage
description: This book is about a serious subject, but dealt with in a frank, irreverent and humorous way. All over the world, as you read this, there are relationships and marriages meandering along in a polite, unspectacular fashion. This book asks men to dig deeper, be better boyfriends/husbands, and get the best out of the beautiful women they have invited into their life.
author: Lindsay Wesker
